features: Shock Absorb Technology - Our unique razor auto-adjusts based on how you shave, backing off if you’re applying too much pressure, or adding back when you need it
Flip Trimmer for Hard-to-Reach Areas - Conveniently switch between shaving larger surfaces with all 5 blades, and precision trimming with single edging blade, all with a simple flip of the thumb
Dermatologist-tested and has Skin Guards on all 5 blades for a close shave that minimizes friction and irritation
Formulated with Japanese rice bran oil and specially designed for shaving dry skin.
Long Lasting Shave - Designed to last a full month of shaving
body.description: Schick Hydro 5 Dry Skin Razor -Some guys have dry skin in the winter. Others have it all year. Our Dry Skin razor is made with Japanese rice bran oil and is designed to hydrate dry skin, so you can shave every day if you want, and still keep your face feeling fresh and moisturized

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hydro 5 is alive, wait that's Johnny 5
reviews.reviewText: Great razor with 5 blades on the head, with the soothing gel packs to add some moisture to your skin. This is a great set to get started on and see if you like using this razor, it comes with the handle and three replacement cartridges. What I found most unique about this razor is the gel section can be flipped backwards to have a more precise shave, great for doing your sideburns. I have seen them have a blade on the back of the head before, but I really like this solution. t gives a great close shave and leaves your skin feeling smooth, well my skin is smooth anyway, I look like I'm in my 20's when I'm almost 50. So my facial hair still grows in fine so the razors will last me awhile. I do like the hydro strips in the top of this, it would be great if they actually sold replacement strips, because the razor will last me awhile, the strips only last me a few shaves and they are done. But overall this is a great razor set and really like this, Will be buying more blades for this handle when I finally use the last of the blades it came with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my husband who was complaining that the regular hydro ones that he was using were irritating his skin. The sensitive ones don't irritate his skin in the same way and he says the shave is just as close as the regular ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Similar to Harry's razors
reviews.reviewText: I normally shave with an electric razor, but I use a manual razor to get a closer shave in some areas where the electric doesn't do a good enough job, such as on my neck. I have used Harry's razors for years. I love them because their blades are very sharp and they last a long time before I need to replace them. I hadn't used Schick razors in a long time, so I thought I would give this new model a try. I was surprised, but it's really nice. The 5 blades cut about as well as my Harry's blades do. The handle is also very ergonomic. I think this value pack is a good deal since you get 3 cartridges with it. I would definitely recommend this razor to anyone who wants to get a close shave with a manual razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked well for me
reviews.reviewText: I normally use the gillete skinguard, and this one felt like it gave me a similar quality shave to that (which is good). My skin gets pretty dry sometimes while shaving, and I don't think I noticed it as much using this razor, although it's hard to tell because my skin is dryer on different days.The razor felt good to use, it has a nice weight to it, and I haven't had any issues with it snagging skin or anything. This definitely feels like a value pack, I think it's well worth it for the handle and the 3 blade attachments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Value for Pack but Replacement Cartridges are Expensive
reviews.reviewText: I've been using a Schick Quattro razor for years. The razor is so old it's starting to fall apart, so thought I would give this Hydro 5 a try. The Hydro 5 does an excellent job, but compared to the cheaper 4 blade Quattro cartridges, I don't really notice much difference with shaving performance for the 5 blade Hydro 5 cartridge. I do like Hydro 5's flip back precision edger so I can get to the hard-to-reach areas under my nose. With the Quattro the lubrication strip makes this difficult, so that's a nice feature the Hydro 5 has going for it. Still, the price difference is significant. Searching on Amazon, I can get 6 Quattro refill cartridges for about the same price as 4 Hydro 5 refill cartridges. I don't find there's enough of an improvement to make the switch to the more expensive Hydro 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this razer as it has many blades. I use men's blades very often, but usually feel like they don't often have 5 blades so I settle with one that has 4 blades or so. This one comes with 3 blades total, and they're super sharp. I'm one to shave every day, so it definitely helps me feeling super smooth! Very ergonomic and easy to grip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice close shave, weighted well, easy to handle
reviews.reviewText: I typically use Harry's shave products, but thought I'd try a Big Brand again with this. The shave is very smooth -- almost to the point where I had to double check that it was actually shaving! The handle is weighted nicely, has a good balance, and the head maneuvers quite well to hit all the different contours.I figured the Schick brand refills would cost more than Harry's, but to my surprise the refills cost exactly the same per blade. I may have found my new razor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Husband likes it!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my husband who sometimes gets dry and irritated skin when shaving.These razors worked pretty well and he got a nice clean shave without having any irritation.The razor handle is comfortable to hold and easy to shave with and get the angles that he needs.They are good and we are happy we got them.
